member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_INFO
member.summary: TheMIB_OPAQUE_INFO structure contains information returned from a MIB opaque query.

member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_INFO.ullAlign
member.summary: The number of bytes that align the information returned.

member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_INFO.rgbyData
member.summary: A pointer to the information returned from the opaque query.
